data.eml:eml: The Pselaphinae (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae) of Madagascar. VII. Description of Madastiger robustus gen. and sp. nov. from Central Madagascar

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Baňař, Petr (2017): The Pselaphinae (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae) of Madagascar. VII. Description of Madastiger robustus gen. and sp. nov. from Central Madagascar. Zootaxa 4311 (3): 435-440, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4311.3.9
